I feel that we should also check here that the boundary type is the one expected, and I would add:
BoundaryTree boundary = items.get(index).is(RegexTree.Kind.BOUNDARY)
return (position == Position.BEGINNING && boundary.type() == BoundaryTree.Type.LINE_START) 
  || (position == Position.END && boundary.type() == BoundaryTree.Type.LINE_END);

Otherwise, I fear that we might report FPs on regex such as:
"\bTest|assert\b"

Which I believe are valid cases.
